attributes.action: Align the rights of farm animals to those of domestic animals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
align animal welfare laws for factory farmed animals to the same as those that apply to individual pet owners to afford the same rights to farm animals and their treatment.  For example, if a given treatment of a domestic animal is considered to be cruel those same laws should apply to farmed animals and the owners must be open to prosecution.  
Cruelty is still cruelty even if it's commercially motivated.
